item.title: COVID19 API
item.description: API for exploring covid-19 cases around the globe powered by FastAPI framework Introduction As going through 2020, it is clear that the year of the Rat has NOT been friendly at all. We have experienced a series of fierce events. For instance, the tension among global giants, protesting, Australian bushfire season, extreme racial discrimination, and noticeably the COVID-19 pandemic. COVID-19 has been spreading rapidly without showing any signs of stopping or even slowing down.
